TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProcessModelSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class ProcessModelSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 配置 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) Web 服务器上的 ASP.NET 进程模型设置。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET process model settings on an Internet Information Services (IIS) Web server.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `processModel` 节的方法。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `processModel` section of a configuration file. 类控制 ASP.NET 工作进程，包括其生存期内，一次，哪些安全标识下，运行时创建的实例数的各个方面和 CLR 的大小线程池为请求提供服务。The class controls various aspects of the ASP.NET worker process, including its lifetime, the number of instances created at a time, what security identity it runs under, and the size of the CLR thread pool to service requests. 当在 IIS 6 下在纯模式下运行 ASP.NET 时，ASP.NET 将使用 IIS 6 进程模型，并忽略此部分中的大多数设置。When ASP.NET is running under IIS 6 in native mode, ASP.NET uses the IIS 6 process model and ignores most settings in this section. 使用 IIS 管理用户界面 (UI) 来配置这些属性。Use the IIS administration user interface (UI) to configure those properties. ASP.NET 仍将使用以下属性，可通过配置文件进行配置： ， ， ， ， ，和。ASP.NET still uses the following properties, which can be configured through the configuration file: , , , , , and . `processModel`部分不能被加密，使用受保护的配置功能或工具，因为它将使用 ASP.NET ISAPI 扩展插件。The `processModel` section cannot be encrypted using the protected-configuration feature or tools because it is consumed by the ASP.NET ISAPI extension. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为的几个特性指定值`processModel`部分中，还可作为的成员访问类。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `processModel` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件示例演示如何以声明方式为指定值`processModel`部分。The following configuration file example shows how to specify values declaratively for the `processModel` section. ``` ``` 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用默认设置初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using default settings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 获取实例类通过方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoConfig { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为 ASP.NET 应用程序自动配置 ASP.NET 性能设置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ASP.NET performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications.

value.span: 如果为 ASP.NET 应用程序自动配置性能设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if performance settings are automatically configured for ASP.NET applications; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值设置为`false`，显式 Web.config 值用于确定对 ASP.NET 应用程序的性能配置。If the value is set to `false`, explicit Web.config values are used to determine performance configuration for the ASP.NET application. 如果值设置为`true`，性能设置自动配置 ASP.NET 应用程序。If the value is set to `true`, the performance settings are automatically configured for the ASP.NET application. 值显式设置为`true`Machine.config 文件中。The value is explicitly set to `true` in the Machine.config file. 默认代码值设置为`false`。The default code value is set to `false`. 如果从 Machine.config 中删除值，而不是自动配置设置将使用的显式设置。If the value is removed from Machine.config, the explicit settings are used instead of the auto-configured settings.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ClientConnectedCheck { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示请求在队列中的保留时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how long a request is left in the queue.

value.span: 指示排队时间的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the queuing time.
The default value is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定时间长度的请求排队之前 ASP.NET 执行连接的客户端检查。This property specifies how long a request is queued before ASP.NET performs a client connected check. > [!NOTE] > 如果时间间隔到期时请求仍在排队，客户端连接检查完成后再将该请求传递到处理的 ASP.NET 工作进程。If the interval expires while the request is still queued, a client connected check is done before passing the request over to the ASP.NET worker process for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问和修改属性。The following code example shows how to access and modify the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#18)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel ComAuthenticationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComAuthenticationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 DCOM 安全性的身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for DCOM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性的值设置为，DCOM 确定使用其普通的安全协商算法的身份验证级别。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the authentication level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 分配给此属性，请在 Machine.config 文件中，指定的默认值是。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在这种情况下，DCOM 进行身份验证的客户端的凭据仅当客户端建立与服务器之间的关系时。In this case, DCOM authenticates the credentials of the client only when the client establishes a relationship with the server. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#21)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel ComImpersonationLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelComImpersonationLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 COM 安全性的身份验证级别。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the level of authentication for COM security.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性的值设置为，DCOM 确定使用其普通的安全协商算法的模拟级别。When this property value is set to , DCOM determines the impersonation level using its normal security-negotiation algorithm. 分配给此属性，请在 Machine.config 文件中，指定的默认值是。The default value assigned to this property, as specified in the Machine.config file, is . 在这种情况下，服务器进程可以模拟代表客户端操作时的客户端的安全上下文。In this case, the server process can impersonate the client's security context while acting on behalf of the client. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#22)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#22)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CpuMask { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示多处理器服务器上哪些处理器符合运行 ASP.NET 进程的条件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating which processors on a multiprocessor server are eligible to run ASP.NET processes.

value.span: 表示要应用的位模式的数字。

span.span: The number representing the bit pattern to apply.
The default value is 0xFFFFFFFF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值指定的位模式的指示有资格运行 ASP.NET 线程 Cpu。The value specifies a bit pattern that indicates the CPUs eligible to run ASP.NET threads. 如果属性设置为`true`、限制为符合条件的 Cpu 数的工作进程。If the property is set to `true`, the limits worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs. 允许的最大工作进程数等于的 Cpu 数。The maximum allowed number of worker processes is equal to the number of CPUs. 默认情况下，启用所有的 Cpu 和 ASP.NET 启动一个进程，每个 CPU。By default, all CPUs are enabled and ASP.NET launches one process for each CPU. 如果属性设置为`false`、特性忽略，并且只有一个辅助进程将运行。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process will run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#25)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ElementProperty As ConfigurationElementProperty
public: property bool Enable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用此进程模型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the process model is enabled.

value.span: 如果已启用此进程模型，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the process model is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定是否在外部工作进程中承载 ASP.NET。The property specifies whether ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process. 如果是`true`，ASP.NET 是在外部工作进程中承载; 否则为它直接在 Inetinfo.exe 中运行。If is `true`, ASP.NET is hosted in an external worker process; otherwise, it runs directly in Inetinfo.exe. > [!NOTE] > 不建议在 Inetinfo.exe 中运行 ASP.NET，因为这涉及到在本地系统安全上下文中运行应用程序。Running ASP.NET in Inetinfo.exe is not recommended, because this involves running the application in the Local System security context. ASP.NET 运行时在 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6 纯模式下，将忽略此设置，因此通常无需将其设置为`false`。When ASP.NET runs in Internet Information Services (IIS) 6 native mode, this setting is ignored, so there is usually no reason to set it to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan IdleTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示了一个非活动时间期限，在该期限后，ASP.NET 将自动结束辅助进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the period of inactivity after which ASP.NET automatically ends the worker process.

value.span: 指示空闲时间的 值。

span.span: A value indicating the idle time.

value.span: 默认值为 Infinite，它对应于 。

span.span: The default value is Infinite, which corresponds to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新启动工作进程 （反弹），当达到属性值。The worker process is restarted (bounced) when the property value is reached. 默认情况下，只有两种情况会导致进程反弹： 进程超过了允许的内存限制，或进程超过允许的可排队的请求数。By default, only two conditions cause the process to bounce: the process exceeds the allowed memory limit, or the process exceeds the allowed number of requests that can be queued. 可以将其他条件添加到默认类型。You can add other conditions to the default ones. 例如，你可以使用属性可限制工作进程处于空闲状态的时间。For example, you can use the property to limit the time the worker process is idle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#16)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel LogLevel { System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel get(); void set(System::Web::Configuration::ProcessModelLogLevel value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示记录到事件日志中的事件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the event types to be logged to the event log.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过正确使用此属性，你可以筛选系统可以记录的错误。By using this property correctly, you can filter the errors the system can log. 了解应用程序的问题或瓶颈后，你可能想要设计收缩的错误你感兴趣的范围的策略。After you have an idea of the application's malfunctions or bottlenecks, you might want to devise a strategy that narrows the range of errors you are interested in. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#23)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxAppDomains { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个进程中所允许最大应用程序域数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

value.span: 一个进程中所允许的最大应用程序域数。

span.span: The maximum allowed number of application domains in one process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超过阈值，如果必须启动新的应用程序域的最少使用的应用程序域将关闭。If the threshold is exceeded, the least-used application domain is shut down if a new application domain must start. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#27)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxIOThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 CLR 线程池中每个 CPU 的最大 I/O 线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须等于或大于中设置`httpRuntime`配置节。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 你可以对 CPU 使用率的某些控制通过设置工作线程和 I/O 线程数使用属性和属性分别。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and the property respectively. 线程的两种类型的区别是，后者绑定到 I/O 对象，如流或管道，而前者是传统不受限制的线程。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 为 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0 和更高版本，ASP.NET 处理工作线程的请求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and later, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 这是因为 ASP.NET 集成在 IIS 内。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 这些线程是从应用程序属于进程范围 CLR 线程池获取的。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常允许的线程的默认值是不足以保障高的 CPU 使用率。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果由于某种原因，你的应用程序速度较慢，可能在等待外部资源，你可能尝试增大到小于 100 的值的线程数。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWorkerThreads { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 CLR 线程池中每个 CPU 的最大辅助线程数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum amount of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.
The maximum number of threads.
The default is 20.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值必须等于或大于中设置`httpRuntime`配置节。The value of must be equal to or greater than the setting in the `httpRuntime` configuration section. 你可以对 CPU 使用率的某些控制通过设置工作线程和 I/O 线程数使用属性和，属性，分别。You can have some control over the CPU utilization by setting the number of worker threads and I/O threads, using the property and, the property, respectively. 线程的两种类型的区别是，后者绑定到 I/O 对象，如流或管道，而前者是传统不受限制的线程。The difference between the two types of threads is that the latter are bound to I/O objects, such as a stream or a pipe, and the former are traditional unrestricted threads. 为 Internet 信息服务 (IIS) 6.0 和更高版本，ASP.NET 处理工作线程的请求。For Internet Information Services (IIS) version 6.0 and higher, ASP.NET processes requests on worker threads. 这是因为 ASP.NET 集成在 IIS 内。This is because ASP.NET is integrated within IIS. 这些线程是从应用程序属于进程范围 CLR 线程池获取的。These threads are obtained from the process-wide CLR thread pool belonging to an application. > [!NOTE] > 通常允许的线程的默认值是不足以保障高的 CPU 使用率。Usually the default values for the allowed threads are sufficient to keep the CPU utilization high. 如果由于某种原因，你的应用程序速度较慢，可能在等待外部资源，你可能尝试增大到小于 100 的值的线程数。If for some reason your application is slow, perhaps waiting for external resources, you could try to increase the number of threads to a value less than 100. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MemoryLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示所允许的最大内存大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum allowed memory size.

value.span: 占系统总内存的百分比。

span.span: The percentage of the total system memory.
The default is 60 percent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内存大小表示为系统总内存的百分比。The memory size is expressed as a percentage of the total system memory. 这是工作进程可以使用 ASP.NET 重启 （反弹） 之前的内存量它。This is the amount of memory a worker process can consume before ASP.NET restarts (bounces) it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. span.span: The minimum number of I/O threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool.

span.span: The minimum number of worker threads per CPU in the CLR thread pool

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示为 Windows 标识使用的密码。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the password to use for the Windows identity.
The password to use.
The default value is AutoGenerate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须与使用属性。The property must be used with the property. 当存在时，这些属性值将导致要使用的配置的 Windows 标识运行的工作进程。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingFrequency { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示时间间隔的值，每隔一个该时间间隔 ISAPI 扩展会对辅助进程使用 ping 命令以确定其是否在运行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval at which the ISAPI extension pings the worker process to determine whether it is running.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 30 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作进程重新启动 （退信） 如果未在运行间隔已过期。The worker process is restarted (bounced) if it is not running after the interval has expired. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan PingTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示时间间隔的值，在该时间间隔之后没有响应的辅助进程将被重新启动。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval after which a non-responsive worker process is restarted.
The defining the time interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ISAPI 扩展 ping 工作进程在间隔。The ISAPI extensions ping the worker process at the interval. 如果工作进程未响应中重新启动间隔，该过程。If the worker process does not respond within the interval, the process is restarted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#14)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As ConfigurationPropertyCollection
public: property int RequestLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在回收辅助进程之前所允许的请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed before a worker process is recycled.
The number of allowed requests.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超出请求数，则 ASP.NET 自动启动一个新的辅助进程用于代替当前。If the number of requests is exceeded, ASP.NET automatically launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RequestQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示队列中所允许的请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of requests allowed in the queue.

value.span: 队列中所允许的请求数。

span.span: The number of requests allowed to be queued.
The default is 5000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果队列中所允许的请求数超过了，ASP.NET 将开始返回"503-服务器太忙"为新请求的错误。If the number of requests allowed in the queue is exceeded, ASP.NET begins returning "503 – Server Too Busy" errors to new requests. 达到此限制后，系统在异常条件中运行。When this limit is reached, the system is operating in abnormal conditions. 这可能是一种故障的症状，或可能是，只高负载。This might be a symptom of a malfunction or, maybe, just high load. 重新启动 （会传来传去） 的工作进程可能会防止再次出现问题的唯一方法。Restarting (bouncing) the worker process might become the only way to prevent further problems. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ResponseDeadlockInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示辅助进程的响应间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time interval for the worker process to respond.
The defining the interval.
The default is 3 minutes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果排队的请求并且如果没有响应由定义的时间间隔期间重新启动该进程。The process is restarted if there are queued requests and if there has not been a response during the time interval that is defined by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ResponseRestartDeadlockInterval { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 不再使用。

span.span: No longer used.
Not applicable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性不再可供 ASP.NET，并提供有关向后兼容性。This property is no longer used by ASP.NET and is provided for backward compatibility only. 如果已在配置文件中存在，它不会导致配置错误。It will not cause a configuration error if it is already present in a configuration file. 现在由控制发生死锁条件的所有回收属性。All recycling in the event of a deadlock condition is now controlled by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int RestartQueueLimit { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在等待新的辅助进程开始处理请求时被 ISAPI 排队的最大请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum number of requests queued by the ISAPI while waiting for a new worker process to start handling the requests.
The number of requests queued.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当超过此限制时，客户端请求将收到 503 错误，直到辅助进程已就绪。When this limit is exceeded, a client request will receive a 503 error until the worker process is ready. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ServerErrorMessageFile { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示文件的值，当发生致命错误时必须使用该文件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the file whose content must be used when a fatal error occurs.

value.span: 发生致命错误时使用的文件的路径。

span.span: The path of the file used when a fatal error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其内容使用而不是默认服务器不可用消息的文件。The file whose content is used instead of the default Server Unavailable message. 文件位置可以是相对或绝对文件路径。The file location can be a relative or an absolute file path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#28)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ShutdownTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示允许的关闭辅助进程的时间。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the time allowed for the worker process to shut down.
The defining the interval.
The default is 5 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定为要正常关闭其自身的工作进程允许的分钟数。This property specifies the number of minutes allowed for the worker process to shut itself down gracefully. 当超时到期时，ASP.NET 关闭工作进程强制。When the timeout expires, ASP.NET shuts down the worker process forcibly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Timeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在 ASP.NET 启动新的辅助进程之前的分钟数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the number of minutes until ASP.NET launches a new worker process.
The defining the interval.
The default is Infinite.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 将启动新的工作进程来代替当前。ASP.NET launches a new worker process to take the place of the current one. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ UserName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值为 Windows 标识指示用户名。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the user name for a Windows identity.
The user name.
The default value is Machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在，定义不同的默认过程的 Windows 标识。If present, the defines a Windows identity different from that of the default process. 此标识用于运行 ASP.NET 工作进程。This identity is used to run the ASP.NET worker process. 默认情况下，设置为特殊值机，并在名为 ASPNET 安装 ASP.NET 时自动创建用户帐户下的进程运行。By default, is set to the special value Machine, and the process runs under a user account named ASPNET that is created automatically when ASP.NET is installed. 属性必须与使用属性。The property must be used with the property. 当存在时，这些属性值将导致要使用的配置的 Windows 标识运行的工作进程。When present, these property values cause the worker process to run with the configured Windows identity. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为系统中，使用自动生成的密码，它还定义将作为管理帐户运行该进程，并允许在该进程具有完全管理权限下运行的所有 ASP.NET 用户代码的实体。If the property is set to System, with the password AutoGenerate, it defines an entity that runs the process as an administrative account and allows all ASP.NET user code running under the process to have full administrative privileges. 因此，请密切注意到这种情况下，允许的权限。So, pay close attention to this case, for the permissions allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool WebGarden { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值允许可用的 CPU 运行辅助进程。

span.span: Gets or sets a value enabling the available CPUs to run the worker processes.

value.span: 如果使用 将辅助进程映射到符合条件的 CPU 数，则为 ；如果忽略 ，则为 。

span.span: , if is used to map the worker processes to the number of eligible CPUs; if is ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须与使用属性。The property must be used with the property. 如果属性设置为`false`、属性将被忽略，并且只有一个辅助进程运行。If the property is set to `false`, the attribute is ignored and only one worker process runs. > [!NOTE] > 多处理器的 Web 服务器称为 Web 园。A multiprocessor Web server is called a Web garden. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/CS/processmodelsection.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.ProcessModelSection/VB/processmodelsection.vb#24)]
